headline: Dollar General (DG): Evaluating Valuation as Grocery Expansion and Holiday Promotions Drive Customer Growth
summary: Dollar General (DG) is making headlines as its launch of the Holiday Toy Book, combined with expanded fresh grocery options, draws in shoppers seeking both convenience and savings in a value-focused market. See our latest analysis for Dollar General. Dollar General’s share price story this year has reflected a major shift in sentiment. While the current price of $103.58 marks a strong turnaround with a nearly 37% share price return year-to-date, the five-year total shareholder return is still...
